channel.title: Moving objects
channel.description: if i want to move trees for wcing and mining spots would i look for there id...client.java>makeglobalobject>find id> change cords?

item.title: Moving objects
item.dc:creator: @Axiom_Owner Axiom Owner
item.description:
@Axiom_Owner wrote:

pkerzscap3:

Are you new to this, lol.

Just wanted to make sure i was on the right path…

[quote=“Thrasher Alpha, post:3, topic:347213”][quote author=pkerzscap3 link=topic=443590.msg3257243#msg3257243 date=1278211575]
Are you new to this, lol.
[/quote]
And this was the right way for me…thank you
That was helpful.

Last I remember, I think it was in the client.java, you have to go down to the spawn objects section, and spawn the object at the X and Y choords you want, with the object code.

At least thats how I did it in my delta source.

If they are already custom spawned trees, just change the choords.

Go ahead and try your method, though.[/quote]

Read full topic

I KNOW RIGHT
